agent_purpose: Manager agent that orchestrates Content Writer, SEO Analyst, and Graphics Generator
description: Marketing Coordinator is a MANAGER agent that orchestrates Content Writer, SEO Analyst, and Graphics Generator sub-agents. It aggregates all sub-agent outputs into a unified campaign package. Response follows {status, result: {summary, data: {campaign_overview, written_content, seo_recommendations, visual_assets, consistency_notes, revision_flags}}, metadata} format. All data fields are strings containing consolidated deliverables.
